alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued December 06 at 3:02AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST HEALTH ALERT IN EFFECT FOR THE SOUTHERN POWDER RIVER BASIN OF NORTHEASTERN WYOMING FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... The following message is transmitted in collaboration with the Wyoming Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division. * WHAT...West to southwest winds of 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Powder River Basin of northeastern Wyoming. * WHEN...Midnight tonight to 5 PM on Thursday. * IMPACTS...The strong winds will create blowing dust. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... The Wyoming Air Quality Division recommends the elderly, young children, and individuals with respiratory problems avoid excessive physical exertion and minimize outdoor activities during this time. Although these people are most susceptible to health impacts, the air quality division also advises that everyone should avoid prolonged exposure to the poor air quality conditions.
